about_the_game:
In "Palm Sugar: A Village Story" you embark on an exciting journey across the vibrant and colorful region of South India. Set in a small village gripped by the iron fist of a vicious drug cartel, you play as Srinu, a young and adventurous boy. Wield weapons, meet compelling characters, and navigate through dialogue-heavy levels, filled with humor and sarcasm.

Culture:

Immerse yourself in the vibrant culture of South India.

Experience captivating dialogues charged with humor, morals, and wit.

Weapons:

Explore an array of unconventional weapons such as sticks, axes, spears, slingshots, and more.

Simple RPG-System:

We are implementing a simple RPG system, featuring a creative inventory where players trade quest items and craft tools and weapons to progress through missions and levels.

Experience the triumphs and disasters of a boy named Srinu.

Localization and Cultural Nuances:

"Palm Sugar" transcends gaming by fully embracing the cultural nuances of South India. The game is thoughtfully localized in Telugu, English, and Hindi ensuring players can deeply connect with the dialogues and cultural references. The narrative draws inspiration from iconic figures, seamlessly integrating Telugu cinema's wit and wisdom into the gaming experience. Immerse yourself in the authenticity of regional storytelling as you embark

name: Palm Sugar: A Village Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 10.0 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 12.0 compatible video Card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: In Palm Sugar, you play as Srinu, a young and resolute boy. Your beloved village has been taken over by a vicious drug cartel. Go on a perilous journey across South India and dive into its rich and colorful culture. The fate of the village and its people rests in your hands.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
